text: Gene Porter Bridwell (born October 4, 1935) is an American NASA official. He was the seventh director of the NASA Marshall Space Flight Center located in Huntsville, Alabama. He was director from January 6, 1994 to February 3, 1996. Bridwell was born in Linton, Indiana. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Engineers from Indiana Category:Scientists from Indiana
title: Gene Porter Bridwell
